mapper.sql: id, create_by, create_time, update_by, update_time, del_flag, shop_id, prod_id, product_name, product_img, unit_id, unit, dish_type, dish_code, help_code, product_desc, product_type_id, product_type, shop_prod_status
mapper.select: SELECT temp.id, temp.shop_id, s.shop_name, temp.prod_id, temp.product_name, temp.product_img, temp.product_type_id, SUM(temp.price) as price, (select ifnull(sum(prod_num),0) from order_product where shop_prod_id = temp.id and del_flag = 0) as sellnum FROM ( SELECT sp.id AS id, sp.shop_id, sp.prod_id, sp.product_name, sp.product_img, sp.product_type_id, MIN(price) AS price FROM shop_product sp LEFT JOIN shop_product_spec sps ON sps.shop_prod_id = sp.id and sps.del_flag = 0 WHERE sp.shop_id = #{shopId} and sp.shop_prod_status = 1 and sp.del_flag = 0 GROUP BY sps.sku_id ) temp LEFT JOIN shop s ON s.id = temp.shop_id GROUP BY temp.id ORDER BY sellnum DESC LIMIT 16

select * from ( select temp.shop_id, temp.shop_name, temp.id, temp.prod_id, temp.product_name, temp.product_img, temp.product_type_id, sum(price) as price from ( select sp.shop_id, s.shop_name, sp.id, sp.prod_id, sp.product_name, sp.product_img, sp.product_type_id, ifnull(min(sps.price), 0) as price from shop_product sp left join shop_product_spec sps on sps.shop_prod_id = sp.id and sps.del_flag = 0 left join shop s on s.id = sp.shop_id where sp.shop_id = #{param.shopId} and sp.shop_prod_status = 1
and sp.prod_id not in
#{item}
and sp.del_flag = 0 group by sps.sku_id ) temp group by temp.prod_id order by RAND() limit 12 ) t

select * from ( select temp.shop_id, temp.prod_id, temp.id, temp.product_name, temp.product_img, temp.product_type_id, sum(temp.price) as price, (select ifnull(sum(pgo.times),0) from product_glance_over pgo where temp.prod_id = pgo.prod_id and pgo.del_flag = 0) as times
from ( select sp.shop_id, sp.id, sp.prod_id, sp.product_name, sp.product_img, sp.product_type_id, ifnull(min(sps.price), 0) as price from shop_product sp left join shop_product_spec sps on sps.shop_prod_id = sp.id and sps.del_flag = 0 where sp.shop_id = #{shopId} and sp.shop_prod_status = 1 and sp.del_flag = 0 group by sps.sku_id ) temp group by temp.prod_id order by times desc limit 8 ) t

select sp.id, sp.prod_id, sp.product_name, sp.product_img, sp.product_desc, sp.shop_id, sp.product_type_id, sp.product_type, sp.dish_type, sps.price as spsPrice, sps.sku_id as skuId, sps.sku_name as skuName, sps.id as shop_prod_spec_id, sps.spec_name, sps.default_flag, sps.sku_id, sps.stock from shop_product sp left join shop_product_spec sps on sps.shop_prod_id = sp.id and sps.del_flag = 0 inner join product_sku ps on ps.id = sps.sku_id and ps.del_flag = 0 where sp.id = #{id} order by sps.sku_id,sps.id

select sp.id, sp.prod_id, sp.product_name, sp.product_img, sp.product_desc, sp.shop_id, sp.product_type_id, sp.product_type, 0 as spsPrice, kcg.id as skuId, kcg.group_name as skuName, kcgd.id as shop_prod_spec_id, kcgd.dish_name as spec_name, kcgd.default_flag, sps.stock from shop_product sp left join shop_product_spec sps on sps.shop_prod_id = sp.id and sps.del_flag = 0 left join kry_combo_group kcg on kcg.shop_prod_id = sp.id and kcg.del_flag = 0 left join kry_combo_group_detail kcgd on kcg.id = kcgd.combo_group_id and kcgd.del_flag = 0 where sp.id = #{id} order by kcg.sort,kcgd.sort

SELECT temp.id, temp.shop_id, temp.shop_name, temp.address, temp.prod_id, temp.product_name, temp.product_img, temp.product_type_id, temp.product_type, temp.lng, temp.lat, temp.product_desc, temp.labels, temp.sort, sum(price) as price FROM ( SELECT sp.id, s.lat, s.lng, s.id AS shop_id, s.shop_name, concat( s.province, s.city, s.district, s.address ) AS address, sp.prod_id, sp.product_name, sp.product_img, sp.product_type_id, sp.product_type, sp.product_desc, pt.sort, min( price ) AS price, sp.labels FROM shop s INNER JOIN ( SELECT sp.*, GROUP_CONCAT(concat(l.label_name,'/',l.color)) labels FROM shop_product sp LEFT JOIN shop_product_label spl ON spl.shop_product_id = sp.id AND spl.del_flag = 0 LEFT JOIN label l ON l.id = spl.label_id AND l.del_flag = 0 WHERE sp.del_flag = 0 AND sp.shop_prod_status = 1 GROUP BY sp.id ) sp ON s.id = sp.shop_id INNER JOIN shop_product_spec sps ON sps.shop_prod_id = sp.id AND sps.del_flag = 0 INNER JOIN product_type pt ON pt.id = sp.product_type_id WHERE s.id = #{shopId} AND s.del_flag = 0 GROUP BY sps.sku_id ) temp GROUP BY temp.id ORDER BY temp.sort, temp.price

select temp.id, temp.shopId, temp.shop_name, temp.prod_id, temp.product_name, temp.product_img, temp.lat, temp.lng, temp.product_type_id, temp.product_type, sum(price) as price from ( select s.id as shopId, s.shop_name, sp.id, sp.prod_id, sp.product_name, sp.product_img, s.lng, s.lat, sp.product_type_id, sp.product_type, min(sps.price) as price from shop s left join shop_product sp on s.id = sp.shop_id and sp.shop_prod_status = 1 and sp.del_flag = 0 left join shop_product_spec sps on sps.shop_prod_id = sp.id and sps.del_flag = 0 where s.id = #{shopId} and sp.product_name like concat('%', #{productName}, '%') and s.del_flag = 0 group by sps.sku_id ) temp group by temp.id

select sp.product_name from shop_product sp inner join orders o on o.shop_id = sp.shop_id and o.del_flag = 0 where o.shop_id = #{shopId} and o.order_status = 100 and sp.del_flag = 0 group by sp.prod_id order by count(1) desc limit 10

SELECT s.id shopId,sp.id shopProductId, ROUND( 6378.138 * 2 * ASIN( SQRT( POW( SIN( ( #{lat} * PI() / 180- lat * PI() / 180 ) / 2 ), 2 ) + COS( #{lat} * PI() / 180 ) * COS( lat * PI() / 180 ) * POW( SIN( ( #{lng} * PI() / 180- lng * PI() / 180 ) / 2 ), 2 ) ) ) * 1000 ) AS distance FROM shop s left join shop_product sp on s.id = sp.shop_id WHERE s.del_flag = 0 and sp.del_flag = 0 and sp.prod_id = #{productId} ORDER BY distance ASC LIMIT 1
